Class.ClassComment: DataInputUtil /** * A util class for DataInput. */

Method.MethodComment: /** * Skips requested number of bytes, throws EOFException if there is too few bytes in the DataInput. * @param in DataInput to be skipped. * @param skippedBytes number of bytes to skip. if skippedBytes <= zero, do nothing. * @throws java.io.EOFException if EOF meets before requested number of bytes are skipped. * @throws IOException if IOException occurs. It doesn't contain EOFException. * @throws NullPointerException if the param 'in' equals null. */
